address_scope.description: List only subnet pools of given address scope in output (name or ID)

any_tags.description: List subnet pools which have any given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

default.description: List subnet pools used as the default external subnet pool

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: csv, json, table, value, yaml)

name.description: List only subnet pools of given name in output

no_default.description: List subnet pools not used as the default external subnet pool

no_share.description: List subnet pools not shared between projects

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

not_any_tags.description: Exclude subnet pools which have any given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

not_tags.description: Exclude subnet pools which have all given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)

project.description: List subnet pools according to their project (name or ID)

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

share.description: List subnet pools shared between projects

tags.description: List subnet pools which have all given tag(s) (Comma-separated list of tags)
